title: The Tea Lab
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Drinks and lunchbar with a relaxed atmosphere. Suitable for working/studying, taking a break after shopping or for a quick lunch. Veg choices on the menu for cake & sweets, sandwiches, salads & soup. Has plant based milk for coffee, soy yoghurt instead of regular yoghurt costs extra. House made granola is vegan. Ask for the vegan high tea.
